name: Inside the Facility
description:
Your friend Mike thinks no one can infiltrate THE FACILITY, but you're going to prove him wrong.

Now you can play Inside the Facility with your mouse, or on a touchscreen device!

(If you love typing, you can use the "toggle prompt" button to activate keyboard input. Not recommended for touchscreen devices.)

Here's a walkthrough.

Find more games by Arthur DiBianca on IFDB.
